Further, a group of thieves makes an attempt to attack him during a high-stakes delivery. Additionally, Awan and Nina manage to crack a mysterious message. Here’s all […] The post Duster Episode 5 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ritika Singh
excerpt: Curious to know the Duster Episode 5 release date and time? Check out all the details on that and more here.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: The Duster Episode 5 release date and time are right around the corner. The previous episode showcased Jim finding out that he is being pursued by a killer. Further, a group of thieves makes an attempt to attack him during a high-stakes delivery. Additionally, Awan and Nina manage to crack a mysterious message. Here’s all you need to know about the release date of Duster’s fifth episode, including how you can stream it online. When is the Duster Episode 5 release date & time? The episode’s release date is June 12, 2025, and its release time is 6 PM PT and 9 PM ET in the U.S. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeJune 12, 20259 PMPacific TimeJune 12, 20256 PM Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in the drama series right here. Where to watch Duster Episode 5 You can watch Duster Episode 5 via HBO Max. HBO Max is a paid streaming service by Warner Bros. Discovery. It combines all the acclaimed HBO content with a broader selection of programming from Discovery’s brands, including HGTV, Food Network, TLC, and ID. Popular originals include Succession, Euphoria, and Game of Thrones. Fans can stream all the episodes of Duster on HBO Max after paying for a subscription. This is because the streaming platform does not give the option of free trials to new users. What is Duster about? The series chronicles the adventures of the FBI’s Black agent, Nina. She is accompanied by a getaway driver, Jim, and together, they fight against crime. The official synopsis for Duster is as follows: “In 1972, the first Black female FBI agent heads to the Southwest and recruits a gutsy getaway driver in a bold effort to take down a growing crime syndicate.”
html:
The Duster Episode 5 release date and time are right around the corner. The previous episode showcased Jim finding out that he is being pursued by a killer. Further, a group of thieves makes an attempt to attack him during a high-stakes delivery. Additionally, Awan and Nina manage to crack a mysterious message.

Here’s all you need to know about the release date of Duster’s fifth episode, including how you can stream it online.

When is the Duster Episode 5 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is June 12, 2025, and its release time is 6 PM PT and 9 PM ET in the U.S.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in the drama series right here.

Where to watch Duster Episode 5

You can watch Duster Episode 5 via HBO Max.

HBO Max is a paid streaming service by Warner Bros. Discovery. It combines all the acclaimed HBO content with a broader selection of programming from Discovery’s brands, including HGTV, Food Network, TLC, and ID. Popular originals include Succession, Euphoria, and Game of Thrones. Fans can stream all the episodes of Duster on HBO Max after paying for a subscription. This is because the streaming platform does not give the option of free trials to new users.

What is Duster about?

The series chronicles the adventures of the FBI’s Black agent, Nina. She is accompanied by a getaway driver, Jim, and together, they fight against crime.

The official synopsis for Duster is as follows:

“In 1972, the first Black female FBI agent heads to the Southwest and recruits a gutsy getaway driver in a bold effort to take down a growing crime syndicate.”
